name: Dead by Daylight - Portrait of a Murder
name_original: Dead by Daylight - Portrait of a Murder
description: The latest chapter for Dead by Daylight includes a new Killer – The Artist – and a new Survivor, Jonah Vasquez. A new Realm, the surreal Forsaken Boneyard, will be opened for all players. Purchasing this add-on also unlocks an exclusive cosmetic for Jonah: The Crimson Shirt.
